name: Hexqueror
description:
How to play:

You play for the blue side, your goal is to destroy all red hexes.

When attacking a hex, the hex gives only half its weight.

The damage when capturing the fortress is reduced by another half.

When you capture a yellow plus square, you receive an instant bonus of 5 points.

To capture another hex, drag your finger away from the hex you have already captured. 

There are two levels in the game.
